effect.red_blue: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.
effect.yellow: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.
effect.red_green_japan: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.
effect.blue_japan: Removes stat, accuracy, and evasion modifiers from every Pokémon on the field. This does not count as a stat reduction for the purposes of clear body or white smoke.

short_effect.red_blue: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.
short_effect.yellow: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.
short_effect.red_green_japan: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.
short_effect.blue_japan: Resets all Pokémon’s stats, accuracy, and evasion.
